mapper.select:
SELECT TD.ID, TD.PARENTID, TD.POSTALCODE, TD.REMARK, TD.NAME, TD.FULLNAME, TD.CODE, TD.TYPE, TD.IDCARDCODE FROM BASIC_DISTRICT TD WHERE
AND TD.ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BASIC_DISTRICT ( ID, PARENTID, POSTALCODE, REMARK, NAME, FULLNAME, CODE, TYPE, IDCARDCODE ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parentId}, #{postalCode}, #{remark}, #{name}, #{fullName}, #{code}, #{type}, #{idCardCode} )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM BASIC_DISTRICT TD WHERE
AND TD.ID = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE BASIC_DISTRICT TD
PARENTID = #{parentId,javaType=java.lang.String},
POSTALCODE = #{postalCode,javaType=java.lang.String},
REMARK = #{remark,javaType=java.lang.String},
NAME = #{name,javaType=java.lang.String},
FULLNAME = #{fullName,javaType=java.lang.String},
CODE = #{code,javaType=java.lang.String},
TYPE = #{type,javaType=com.tx.component.mainframe.basicdata.DistrictTypeEnum},
IDCARDCODE = #{idCardCode,javaType=java.lang.String},
WHERE TD.ID = #{id}
